snippet: A 2-year-old boy who died was the son of the Vikings star Adrian Peterson. A man has been charged with aggravated assault and aggravated battery in the death.
abstract: NFL Roundup; Minnesota Vikings running back Adrian Peterson is in mourning after his 2-year-old son dies of injuries sustained in child-abuse case in South Dakota; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: A 2-year-old boy who died was the son of the Vikings star Adrian Peterson. A man has been charged with aggravated assault and aggravated battery in the death.
